thread.title: Priceline Instagram Campaign Attracting Wanderlust from Travelers
thread.title_full: Priceline Instagram Campaign Attracting Wanderlust from Travelers

title: Priceline Instagram Campaign Attracting Wanderlust from Travelers
text:
Features & Advice 
Priceline.com has launched an Instagram campaign that has already gone viral. 
The #RoomWithAView Instagram campaign has been sending influential people in the travel, lifestyle and fashion industries to various hotels across the country, starting with Kaley Cuoco-Sweeting of “The Big Bang Theory” five weeks ago (who goes by the alias @normancook on Instagram). Priceline.com is collaborating with 15 influencers in all, sending them to 15 hotels in 15 cities throughout September and October to share partner hotels. 
What’s more, if followers guess which hotel the Instagram photo was taken at, they could win $300 to use toward staying in their own #RoomWithAView. 
As of this writing, the hashtag #RoomWithAView has racked up more than 282,000 posts. 
In addition to Cuoco-Sweeting, priceline.com is partnering with Brooke Dombroski , Leo Chan , Sazan Hendrix , Tessa Barton , Jillian Harris , Marissa Meade , Roderick Hunt , Mary Seng , Kat Tanita , Bryan Dale , Max Wastler and Jenny Bernheim . 
With the campaign, priceline.com “aims to leverage its hotel partners and influencer friends while tapping into travelers’ fondness for aspirational travel photography and drive to get the best deal,” according to the online travel agency. 
The campaign’s overall goal is to show that Instagram-worthy hotel views are attainable when booking through priceline.com at deep discounts. 
Below are some of TravelPulse’s favorite Instagram photos from the participating influencers. Follow along with the #RoomWithAView hashtag.
